title: The Hotel That Inspired ‘The Shining’ is Building a Horror Museum
text:
The Hotel That Inspired ‘The Shining’ is Building a Horror Museum 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
You’ve got to hand it to the Stanley Hotel. They took the fact that their establishment was the inspiration for the haunted hotel that dri...
